name: CustomDDR
short_description:
When run on a ConfigMgr Client, CustomDDR creates a custom Discovery Data Record (DDR) and delivers it to the Client's assigned ConfigMgr Site Server using VBScript and the ConfigMgr SDK SMSGEN Dll's.

The CustomDDR scripted solution can be deployed to ConfigMgr Clients using Software Distribution, via Task Sequence Deployment, basically via any existing mechanism in the infrastructure to execute on demand such as via Logon Script, or even run manually.

The solution relies on 32-bit DLL's and the scripted solution is divided into a script that can be run in either 64-bit or 32-bit WScript, which then in turn invokes 32-bit WScript and performs the tasks related to DLL access for DDR generation. As a consequence of this the initial script will only return information based on the environment it is running under which means you can access 32-bit repositories (via Windows on Windows, WOW) by running the initial script using 32-bit WScript (%WINDIR%SYSWOW64) or alternatively access 64
